src:
FOTO: Tradisi Tahunan Pengumpulan Bison di Utah
01 Nov 2019, 12:52 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pengumpulan bison diharapkan bisa "menertibkan" jumlah bison yang ada di Pulau Antelope, Utah, Amerika Serikat.


Pengendara kuda menyiapkan tunggangannya menjelang acara pengumpulan bison di Pulau Antelope, Utah, Amerika Serikat pada Sabtu (26/10).Â (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Pemandangan acara pengumpulan bison tahunan di Pulau Antelope, Utah, Amerika Serikat pada Sabtu (26/10). (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Ratusan penunggang kuda melakukan aksi pengumpulan bison tahunan. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Acara ini dilakukan di Pulau Antelope yang dimulai Sabtu (26/10) hingga tiga pekan ke depan. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Perjalanan dimulai di Peternakan Fielding Garr, di mana bison dihalau melintasi pulau menuju dekat Teluk White Rock. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Acara yang digelar setiap musim gugur ini bertujuan untuk memeriksa kesehatan dan melakukan vaksinasi bison. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Jika dianggap kelebihan populasi, bison yang telah cukup umur akan dijual. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)



Pengumpulan bison diharapkan bisa "menertibkan" jumlah bison yang ada di Pulau Antelope. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer)
text:
PHOTO: Annual Tradition of Bison Collection in Utah
01 Nov 2019, 12:52 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The collection of bison is expected to be able to "curb" the number of bison in Antelope Island, Utah, United States.


Horse riders prepare their mounts ahead of the bison gathering event on Antelope Island, Utah, United States on Saturday (10/26). (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



A view of the annual bison gathering event on Antelope Island, Utah, United States on Saturday (10/26). (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



Hundreds of horse riders take annual bison gathering. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



The event was held on Antelope Island which began Saturday (10/26) for the next three weeks. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



The journey begins at the Fielding Garr Ranch, where bison is driven across the island to nearby White Rock Bay. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



The program, which is held every fall, aims to check health and vaccinate bison. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



If it is considered to be overpopulated, bison who are old enough will be sold. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)



The collection of bison is expected to "bring order" to the number of bison on Antelope Island. (AP Photo / Rick Bowmer)
